product_overview: Plana is a comprehensive event management platform that enables users to register, browse, and book events, while providing administrators with full control over event creation, approval, user management, and support issue handling.
core_goals: Provide seamless user registration and authentication with secure session management.
Enable efficient event creation, approval, and management by administrators.
Allow users to browse and book events with real-time availability and booking confirmation.
Deliver accurate real-time dashboard statistics on bookings, revenue, and active users.
Automate background processes such as notifications and periodic checks to enhance user engagement and system responsiveness.
Facilitate effective support and issue reporting with immediate feedback for users.
key_features: User Management: handles user registration, login, profile updates with JWT authentication and encrypted passwords.
Event Management: allows creation, approval, viewing, and deletion of events by admins.
Booking Management: supports user event bookings with real-time ticket availability checks and revenue tracking.
Support & Feedback System: users can report issues which admins manage and respond to directly.
Real-time Dashboard: displays up-to-date statistics like total revenue, active events, and user counts.
Background Automation: recurring cron jobs for notifications and system monitoring.
user_flow_summary: User visits platform and views landing page with engaging animations.
New users register and existing users log in with role-based access control.
Users browse event gallery and select events to book.
Booking request is processed, availability is checked, and confirmation is returned.
User dashboard updates immediately with new booking and live stats.
Admins log in to executive console to view stats and manage events and user issues.
Admins create or approve events via modal forms and manage user-reported issues.
Users submit support requests and receive prompt admin feedback visible in their support history.
validation_criteria: User registration, login, and profile management functions operate securely with encrypted passwords and JWT.
Events can be created, viewed, approved, and deleted accurately through the API.
Bookings reflect correct ticket availability and update in real time on the user dashboard.
Dashboard statistics such as revenue and active users are always current and accurate from database queries.
Background cron jobs run reliably at scheduled intervals for notifications and system checks.
Support issue reporting and admin responses display correctly and update instantly in user interfaces.
